Cambridge MA Experienced Data Analyst who can lead and mentor junior developers through the full reporting development life cycle 2 years of experience in SSIS SQL Server and Power BI Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Data Analyst Commercial Insurance IT Security Liberty Mutual Boston MA February 2018 to Present Coled development of an AWS vulnerability reporting tool that resulted in the remediation of 50 of identified unencrypted resources tied to applications since product launch in July 2018 Created Power BI reports to identify vulnerabilities tied to various AWS resource types Assisted with Python development to pull data from AWS accounts and push to a SQL Server database Moved from CI IT Analytic Solutions to CI IT Security due to company restructure Data Analyst Commercial Insurance IT Analytic Solutions Liberty Mutual Seattle WA March 2016 to January 2018 Developed automated dashboards using SSIS SQL PowerPivot and Power View to visualize data around security metrics that management could use for vulnerability remediation efforts Became technical lead of security reporting initiatives within the team due to expansion of security reporting requests and initial success working with security Product Owner Utilized SSIS to load data from XML files SharePoint lists and databases as well as push data updates to various internal SharePoint lists Mentored junior developers to build dashboards and ETL solutions for Security Metrics initiatives within the overall Analytic Solutions team Technical Development Program Liberty Mutual Portsmouth NH June 2014 to August 2016 Participated in twoyear entrylevel IT development program and rotated through three positions Business Systems Analyst Data Lead and Data Analyst Gained experience in SQL Java project management requirements gathering and quality assurance Remained on the Analytic Solutions team after the third and final rotation of the program Education Bachelor of
